name: Sporell
description:
Defend your island against a swarm of evil lizards! The lizards want a taste of you... feed them your vengeance!

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Right Click - Shoot

Left Click - Melee

E (Once Experience Bar is full) - InstaKill

------------------------------------------------------

Devs
